page.title: 09EVENTS
page.content: Every year the school holds a May Fair at which there is Maypole and Sword dancing and stalls for selling bottles, cakes, plants,clothes and books. There are also games and competitions like skittles, roll-a-penny, guessing the weight of a pig,and hoop-la. This year the May King and Queen, children of the school,were crowned by the Mayor and Mayoress of Totnes, who also opened the Fair. The School sports day is held in July on the Village playing field next to the school. The school holds several coffee mornings during the year when toys, plants, books, and clothes are sold in aid of school funds. At Christmas the school holds a concert which includes a Nativity play
